H0.text: region of antarctica where march of the penguins filmed. Antarctic Peninsula

H1.text: region of antarctica where march of the penguins filmed. Ross Sea

H2.text: region of antarctica where march of the penguins filmed. East Antarctica

H3.text: region of antarctica where march of the penguins filmed. Adélie Land

A4.text: It took one year for the two isolated cinematographers Laurent Chalet and Jérôme Maison to shoot the documentary, which was shot around the French scientific base of Dumont d'Urville in Adélie Land.

A5.text: Director and film crew spent more than 13 months at the Dumont d'Urville Station, where the Institut polaire français Paul-Émile Victor is based.
